raw_body: Wife of late S.C. Pathirana (DIG), mother of Dammi Pathirana and Maheshi Pathirana, dearest loving grandmother of Keshorn and Malaika, mother- in-law of Wendell, sister of late Jothirathna Perera, late Gunawathi Perera, Asoka Perera. Remains lie at Residence No. 472, Kahanthota Road, Arangala, Malabe. Cortege leaves residence on Friday 15th December 2023 at 2.15 p.m. for cremation at 3.00 p.m. at Battaramulla C
